data.title: Fullstack Web Deveoper
data.description: With experience in the hospital, I've served as a Fullstack Developer, ensuring the successful implementation and maintained web-based Hospital Management System (SIMRS covering modules such as Medical Records & Patient Services, Finance, Facilities & Infrastructure, Pharmacy Warehouse, Human Resources, and Management. My responsibilities include:
subDescription: Understanding the hospital workflow and Training users.
Diagnosed and resolved application bugs, feature customization, and enhanced system performance.
Integrating with E-Klaim BPJS API for national health insurance claim processing and Implementing bridging for integration of medical devices with hospital systems.
Working with Laravel, Angular, and PostgreSQL, Linux.

data.title: WMS Application Go-Live Trainer
data.description: When I was a bachelor's student, I took a job as a freelance trainer for one week at PT.Pertamina Lubricants, based on DSP Batakan, Balikpapan. My daily job was to:
subDescription: Delivered on-site training for employees at PT. Pertamina Lubricants (DSP Batakan, Balikpapan) on the use of WMS (Warehouse Management System) applications during system go-live.
Guided staff in executing inbound and outbound warehouse processes using the WMS (Warehouse Management System) platform.
Identified, documented, and reported system issues or user challenges to WMS customer support for timely resolution.

subDescription: Learned and app
lied front-end technologies: React.js, Redux, GraphQL, Figma, Git, and deployment tools.

Participated in mentorship sessions covering topics such as System Analysis, UI/UX Design Principles, Git & GitHub, CI/CD workflows, Angular, and Lumen with JWT authentication.
